author: Jessica Yeh

changelog.release_notes: Fixed a bug where auto reminder went off too often if you used a custom drinking unit.
- fixed bug where reminders didn't stop during the night
- fixed bug where gallon wouldn't reset at right time and reminders were also buggy for Pebble Time

- fixed a bug where the streak could go to 65535
- changed the default setting for reminders to be on Auto instead of Off to make it more obvious that reminders are a feature
added a description for Customary and Metric to make it more clear what that setting is for

- increased font size on the amount consumed label for better legibility
- added a custom drinking unit option, e.g. you can now set a drinking unit of 12 oz or anything else
- fixed appearance issues on Pebble Time

- metric unit mode
- start of day setting
- menu app icon

- Drink reminders: Reminds you to drink water throughout the day with a vibration and notification
- More time options for "End of Day" setting
- Improved water container images
- New settings icon
- Bug fixes

description:
Challenge yourself to drink more water for better health! Health experts recommend drinking at least a half gallon (8 cups) of water every day. Drinking enough water can help you lose weight by controlling your appetite, boosting your metabolism, and aiding your digestion.

Is 8 cups a day too easy for you? Aim for a whole gallon of water! In the 30-day water challenge, you challenge yourself to drink a gallon of water every day for 30 days straight. People who have completed this challenge report a wide range of beneficial results, such as weight loss, more energy, less headaches, better mood, softer hair, and healthier looking skin.

With Gallon Challenge, you can help yourself drink more water by keeping count of how much water you drink each day, and how many days in a row you've met your goal. The app also keeps track of statistics such as the total amount of water you've recorded consuming and the length of your longest streak.

You can customize your drinking goal to be either a half gallon or whole gallon of water each day. The unit that you drink in can be customized to either ounces, cups, pints, or quarts. You can change the hour that your day starts at in case you have an irregular schedule.

New in version 2! Set reminders to drink water. You can either choose how often you want to be reminded, or use Auto reminders to let the app evenly space them out throughout the day to keep you on track for reaching your goal. These reminders won't bother you while you sleep, because it uses your "End of Day" setting to know approximately what time you are asleep.
